Weekly.Title: Mow the lawn
Weekly.Description: Cut the front and back yard

Weekly.Title: Do Laundry
Weekly.Description: Separate whites and colors and wash.

Weekly.Title: Mop Kitchen
Weekly.Description: Mop Kitchen floor with 1/3 bleach solution

Monthly.Title: Clean Fridge
Monthly.Description: Take all items out and wipe fridge clean

Monthly.Title: Clean out trashcans
Monthly.Description: Wash and clean out inside of trashcan

Monthly.Title: Change out lightbulbs
Monthly.Description: figure out wattage and type of bulb to replace

Yearly.Title: Pressure Wash House
Yearly.Description: Rent pressure washer and clean outside house

Yearly.Title: Spray for Termites
Yearly.Description: Call termix and have them come out to spray

Yearly.Title: Repaint Interior walls
Yearly.Description: Grab bucket of gray paint and paint living room

Yearly.Title: Refinish Basement
Yearly.Description: Hire Contractor and begin work on basement

Yearly.Title: Clean out gutters
Yearly.Description: Take ladder and clean out gutters or hire person to do it.

Yearly.Title: Seed the Lawn
Yearly.Description: Hire Lawn service to come out and seed the lawn
